content.p: In collaboration with colleagues across the University, the Global and Political Affairs Unit have led a high-profile global programme of activity to raise the reputation of the University. Bringing together researchers, students and partners, these "mini-campaigns" have enabled the University to increase engagement, raise awareness and improve levels of sentiment amongst key policymakers and stakeholders at local, national and global levels. External Relations led a major delegation of colleagues in Hong Kong in 2019 anchored around SPARK, the British Council Festival of Ideas The event celebrated the enormous contribution our European colleagues make to the University, to Nottingham and to the UK External Relations led a major delegation of colleagues to Germany anchored around the British Councilâ€™s Going Global conference The University hosted a whole day of activity for one of our senior alumni and influential figure in global public health
